name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY1】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [cB-gslGpCO0]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: A scrolling list of 'Sashiire' (gift) participant names on a blue background. Pre-show background music playing.
The screen layout changes to show the 'Starry Bl∞min'' event logo and Tokino Sora's visual on the left, with the name list continuing to scroll on the right.

subtitles.original: 超電波ピース！巡ってまるごとガブッ！と
subtitles.english: Super Electromagnetic Peace! Circling around, gobbling it all up!

subtitles.original: 宇宙（そら）の彼方へ テストで交信Chu！
subtitles.english: To the other side of the universe (Sora), communicating with a test Chu!

subtitles.original: サイン波で唸らせてる 胸躍る超（スーパー）銀河の音
subtitles.english: Making a sine wave hum, a heart-pounding super galactic sound.

subtitles.original: （アバンチューるラリーラリー）
subtitles.english: (Adventure Rally Rally)

subtitles.original: ８光年先の未来誰もが求めるウェルネス（8次元まで）飛んじゃって
subtitles.english: 8 light-years into the future, everyone seeks wellness (up to 8 dimensions), flying away.

subtitles.original: 地球上そうテクテクテクノロジー 満たされちゃってる（アバンチュールPANICPANIC）
subtitles.english: On Earth, with all this tech-tech-technology, we're completely satisfied (Adventure Panic Panic).

subtitles.original: あっちゅーまに時代はぐるり廻り宇宙は8周目？
subtitles.english: In the blink of an eye, time spins around, is the universe on its 8th lap?

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: Please wait a while for the performance to start.

subtitles.original: さぁ時代創造して さぁ次の波へ
subtitles.english: Now, create a new era, now, to the next wave.

subtitles.original: さぁ無限大の可能性へ乗って
subtitles.english: Now, ride on the infinite possibilities.

subtitles.original: 超電波ピース！ ジャックしてまるごとガブッ！と宇宙（そら）の彼方踊れ踊れ
subtitles.english: Super Electromagnetic Peace! Jack it and gobble it all up! Dance, dance to the other side of the universe (Sora).

subtitles.original: 超電波ピース！ 巡ってまるごとガブッ！と エイトなビートに身をまかせ∞（インフィニティ）の先へ
subtitles.english: Super Electromagnetic Peace! Circling around, gobbling it all up! Entrust yourself to the eight-beat and go beyond infinity.

subtitles.original: パラレル地球◯（まる）のスター性？ 末広がるダンスダンスダンス
subtitles.english: The star quality of a parallel Earth? Spreading out, dance, dance, dance.

subtitles.original: まだ見たことない未来を テストで更新Chu！
subtitles.english: Updating the future we haven't seen yet with a test Chu!

subtitles.original: 共鳴する超科学バリ3電波！
subtitles.english: Resonating super science, full-strength radio waves!

subtitles.original: （アバンチューるラリーラリー）
subtitles.english: (Adventure Rally Rally)

subtitles.original: 飛び込むヘリカルバイノーラル
subtitles.english: Diving into helical binaural.

subtitles.original: （アバンチューる大発見！）
subtitles.english: (Adventure Great Discovery!)

subtitles.original: この世に革命と連鎖を 時と宇宙（そら）に打ち放て
subtitles.english: Unleash revolution and chains upon this world, upon time and the universe (Sora).

subtitles.original: 魅せるNewWorld （アバンチュールFunnyFunny）
subtitles.english: A captivating New World (Adventure Funny Funny).

subtitles.original: 1人じゃ行けない所まで ついてきてねルネッサンスYeah
subtitles.english: To places I can't go alone, come with me, Renaissance Yeah.

subtitles.original: さぁ時代を超えて さぁ次はどこへ
subtitles.english: Now, transcend time, now, where to next?

subtitles.original: さぁ巡り続ける時を駆けて
subtitles.english: Now, racing through the endlessly circling time.

subtitles.original: 超電波ピース！ 紡いできたキミとのメモリー一緒に見た夢はここに今
subtitles.english: Super Electromagnetic Peace! The memories woven with you, the dreams we saw together, are here now.

subtitles.original: 幕は上がり始めた 永遠の先へ
subtitles.english: The curtain has begun to rise, towards eternity.

subtitles.original: 超電波ピース！ ジャックしてまるごとガブッ！と宇宙（そら）の彼方踊れ踊れ
subtitles.english: Super Electromagnetic Peace! Jack it and gobble it all up! Dance, dance to the other side of the universe (Sora).

subtitles.original: 超電波ピース！ 巡ってまるごとガブッ！と エイトなビートに身をまかせ∞（インフィニティ）の先へ
subtitles.english: Super Electromagnetic Peace! Circling around, gobbling it all up! Entrust yourself to the eight-beat and go beyond infinity.

subtitles.original: パラレル地球◯（まる）のスター性？ 末広がるダンスダンスダンス
subtitles.english: The star quality of a parallel Earth? Spreading out, dance, dance, dance.

subtitles.original: まだ見たことない未来をベストde更新Chu！
subtitles.english: Updating the future we haven't seen yet with the best Chu!

subtitles.original: 次元を飛び越えて未踏の可能性へ絶賛更新 Chu！
subtitles.english: Leaping across dimensions to unexplored possibilities, updating with praise Chu!
